text:
Mirra (http://mirra.io) - Los Angeles, CA - Full Stack Developer

Mirra is an ad-tech company that develops products for video, mobile and display advertising. We're profitable, investor-backed and growing daily.

We have a small engineering team and each engineer is expected to be flexible in their skill-sets. Our technology stack mainly includes Go, Docker, Git, Javascript, HTML/CSS and AS3 running on various AWS services.

Our office is in DTLA near Wilshire and the 110 freeway.

For more info, reach out to us: technical@mirra.io
